subtopics.name: Synthesis of Epistemological Principles
subtopics.description: This subtopic involves integrating foundational epistemological questions about knowledge acquisition, validation, and understanding into the broader context of theoretical foundations. It ensures that the nature, sources, and limits of knowledge are consistently applied across various disciplines, aligning with the core principles established at Level 0.

subtopics.name: Ontological Alignment
subtopics.description: This subtopic focuses on ensuring that the theoretical foundations are grounded in a coherent ontology. It involves aligning the concepts of existence and reality with the structure and content of knowledge, thereby maintaining consistency with the ontological framework established at Level 0.

subtopics.name: Cognitive Science Integration
subtopics.description: This subtopic involves incorporating insights from cognitive science into the integration process. It leverages understanding of perception, attention, memory, language, problem-solving, and learning to enhance the theoretical foundations' practical applicability and human-centric approach.

subtopics.name: Philosophy of Science Application
subtopics.description: This subtopic applies philosophical insights from the philosophy of science to evaluate the foundations' methods and implications. It ensures that the theoretical foundations are grounded in sound scientific inquiry principles, aligning with the philosophy of science framework established at Level 1.

subtopics.name: Practical Wisdom Embedding
subtopics.description: This subtopic ensures that practical wisdom is embedded within the integrated theoretical foundations. It involves applying skills like decision-making, problem-solving, and ethical reasoning to make the theoretical frameworks more actionable and relevant in real-world contexts.
